column3: was the Captain of the Guard in the secret passageway to Gondolin when Tuor and Voronwë appeared.  Elemmakil was amazed that his friend Voronwë would bring a mortal man with him and announced that he should
column5: slay him.  Voronwë and Tuor answered that they came at the command of Ulmo.  Elemmakil then guided the two through the Seven Gates of the Orfalch Echor
column6: until he delivered them unto Ecthelion
column7: then serving as the Warden of the Great Gate.
